name: makeup-product-scraper
description: ## **Overview** This repository contains a collection of web scraping scripts built using **Puppeteer**, with **AWS Lambda** for managing a pool of IP addresses and a **Docker rotating proxy** for rotating proxies during scraping. The scripts collect data for **concealer**, **bronzer**, and **foundation/setting powder** from the following e-commerce websites: - **Amazon** - **Sephora** - **YesStyle** - **Shoppers Drug Mart**
